page.title: 05Joe Parman,aged 6,of Gretton
page.content: I usually get up about 7a.m.get washed and dressed and have my breakfast about 7.45. This normally means Rice Krispies toast and marmalade and a glass of milk. At 8.45 I leave home for school with my Mum and my sister Rachael. School begins at 8.55 and my favourite lesson is P.E. When we do it indoors we use the school hall and put out several pieces of equipment such as climbing frames,box and springboard. When we go outside in the school playground we have smaller equipment like bats,balls, and hoops and we can choose what we want to use.I stay at school for my dinner and I have a cooked meal.School finishes at 3.45p.m. and I go home by myself because we live quite near in Stafford Rd and it is safe to do so. I have my tea at 5.15 and go to bed about 7.30.
